name: On the Other side (ilonaaaaa)
description:
On the other Side.

A young boy named Nino is trying to bring back to life his friend, a fennec, who died tragically during one of their adventures, by collecting multiple fragments of his soul scattered in a parallel dimension, visible through Nino’s magical yo-yo. But a guardian of the natural order prevents it because Nino acts against the rules of this world.
